revised_title: Richard Price: A Pioneering Figure in 18th Century Science and Philosophy
tldr: This article provides a detailed account of the life and work of Richard Price, a prominent figure in 18th-century science and philosophy. Born in Wales, Price became a prominent moral philosopher and a key figure in the Dissenting Academies of the time. The article explores his early life, education, and career, as well as his contributions to moral philosophy and his connections with other notable figures of the time, such as Thomas Bayes.
